short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension to search books from UNLV Library

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that help you find books in UNLV Library

The extension will give you a book title, author, which library, probably genres, also a thumbnail.

version 0.2.2: fix a error that could not fetch search result if the title has more than 1 words.
